Message.text: Based on our database you may have ADHD (attention deficit hyperactivity disorder). You may find more Information and help if you click on the link:

Link.description: You're not alone and there's nothing wrong with you.

Message.text: Based on our database you may have ASD (autism spectrum disorder). You may find more Information and help if you click on the link:

Link.description: Autism is Not a Disability It's a Different Ability.

Message.text: Based on our database you may suffer from loneliness. You may find more Information and help if you click on the link:

Link.description: Try and open up to people you know and look after yourself.
